<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hybrid Study Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2947) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 75 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Magus](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=95)

**Prerequisites**
[Magus Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2945)

</column>

---

Gain the conflux spell from a [hybrid study](/classes/magus/hybrid-studies) of your choice. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) by studying your [spellbook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53) and performing a physical regimen. You don't gain any of the hybrid study's other benefits.
name: Hybrid Study Spell
